room_title: Escape room "Masquerade" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Loved the Masquerade Manor. Highly recommend. Customer service = 10. Kinda/sorta a difficult room if it's your first time doing escape rooms. Definitely coming back.

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Played two rooms here. The first one we did is "Exodus". It is a pretty easy room for experienced players, but still a good room. The second one we played is "Masquerade". This one is a hard one. The puzzles in this room are pretty well designed. Overall, great staff and great experience.

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Excited to see Exodus in New York. They set the bar for customer service and overall experience. I love the Masquerade Room! One of my favorite out of the 20-ish, I've done.I haven't been disappointed by an Exodus Escape Room yet! But it is the customer service that sets Exodus apart for me.

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Exodus Escape Room is the best! Masquerade Manor is such a fun game, with pleasing aesthetics and clever puzzles. The experience of playing is really great too because it's personalized! I won't mention how, you just gotta play the game and see. But really, it makes the experience so immersive and special. Shoutout to James for being one of the coolest people I've ever met who runs escape rooms! I can't wait to play more of their rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Masquerade" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: One of my favorite things to do with friends, co-workers and family members. Escape rooms are so much fun and especially Exodus Escape Rooms! Over the weekend we played the new Masquerade Room which was challenging but a great experience. Really makes you think outside the box. The staff here was very passionate about what they are doing. The experience was top notch!!!
